subject: Gymnastics
Olympic Games (2012)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Aly Raisman, who is competing for a spot on the United States women’s gymnastics team, has become a favorite of its coordinator, Martha Karolyi, because of her solid performances.
snippet: Aly Raisman, who is competing for a spot on the United States women’s gymnastics team, has become a favorite of its coordinator, Martha Karolyi, because of her solid performances.
